item.description:
This is a great place with plenty of rolling hills and trails. I will lead the group on a moderate paced hike.

The forest lies along Mayflower St. about a half mile beyond the transfer station. Mayflower is off of Route 3A.

Please plan for 2 hours in the woods.

If you get misplaced on your way there, you can call my cell. (508) 559-3677
item.how_to_find_us: My blue Jeep Cherokee will be parked in the BIG parking lot. When coming from Route 3A, the lot is on the RIGHT.
item.name: Knapp Town Forest/Duxbury Forest
